DataElement.preferredName: Image Anatomic Region Sequence DICOM Sequence of Items Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The region of a body of any imaging event which is examed with a set of composite instances of the same Modality, created by the same equipment, with the same Frame of Reference. [Manually-curated]_SQ: Text used to describe named areas of the body as an order set of zero to 'n' values referenced by ordinal position starting with 1 as defined in the 2007 DICOM, Part 5, Paragraph 7.5 Nesting of Data Sets. Size of text may be an Explicit Length or variable Undefined Length.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The region of a body of any imaging event which is examed with a set of composite instances of the same Modality, created by the same equipment, with the same Frame of Reference. [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Property.preferredDefinition: Named areas of the body.:A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.

Concepts.definition: A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Body tissue, region, surface, cavity, fluid, organ, or collection of organs.

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/22/08 - released post NCIA Interim Rpt Changes

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: SQ: Text used to describe named areas of the body as an order set of zero to 'n' values referenced by ordinal position starting with 1 as defined in the 2007 DICOM, Part 5, Paragraph 7.5 Nesting of Data Sets. Size of text may be an Explicit Length or variable Undefined Length.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Sequence; serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.:A group of items of the same type, gathered for display or study.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.
A group of items of the same type, gathered for display or study.

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11/20/13 datatype changed to charater to support OCI. jc  2/11/09 released because VD used in NCIA DE to be released.  8/21/07-DICOM SQ value representation type for DICOM which has a variable size

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 5/20/14 CDE versioned to use new version of VD as part of Rel CDE w retired VD content review. jc  10/10/07  updated for revised CS value representation value domain.  8/22/07-Added RIDER reference from retired CDE 2414568.    8/21/07-CDE created to support DICOM CDE IE - DICOM Attribute-DICOM VR Rep term format.
